thread.title: Donald Trump transition members under surveillance after winning US election, says Devin Nunes
thread.title_full: Donald Trump transition members under surveillance after winning US election, says Devin Nunes

author: Emily Shugerman
title: Donald Trump transition members under surveillance after winning US election, says Devin Nunes
text:
Donald Trump transition members under surveillance after winning US election, says Devin Nunes 
Nunes made the announcement at a press conference Wednesday  51 GMT Click to followThe Independent US House Intelligence Chairman Devin Nunes said at a press conference Wednesday that Donald Trump and his transition team may have been surveilled following the election. Mr Nunes said he uncovered potential surveillance of Mr Trump and his transition team while reviewing intelligence reports. He believes the surveillance to be legally collected, but nevertheless said he is “alarmed” by the discovery. Nunes will travel to the White House Wednesday afternoon to discuss his findings. More to follow.
